title: OPEC+’s Lose-Lose Equation
sub_head: Oil producers face risks no matter which route they choose to take on output
body:
The arrival of a vaccine is a blessing for oil producers. Hopes for a vaccine, however, are causing a massive headache for members of the global oil cartel and its Russian-led partners. Some of its members—financially battered and facing internal turmoil—are reaching the end of their ropes.
The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries met Monday and was scheduled to meet with Russian-led producers Tuesday to decide whether to go along with their next scheduled production increase of two million barrels a day, delay...
